content.prompt: The ideas in the excerpt are most directly situated within the context of United States efforts to do which of the following in the period after the Civil War?

choices.label: End Reconstruction policies in the South
Encourage settlement west of the Mississippi River

topic.text: 6.12: Controversies over the Role of Government in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
